name: Legion of Scorn (itch)
description: Retro, twin-stick shooter  with sci-fi and cyberpunk roots. The year is 2091, part of the U.S. Army Special Forces, C.A.N.E (Cybernetic and Nanite Enhanced) Special Intelligence Sergeant 0813 has been deployed to diagnose the impending threat that advanced technology companies pose to national security.  Battle through the Legion.exe research arena created by Welkin Robotics to test the latest in military robotics technology. The only way to survive and earn your freedom is to battle your way through countless waves of enemies and survive the Legion of Scorn.
